name: Cursed Ruins
description:
This is a find your way out of the maze type game where light plays a vital role. Some walls aren't real, and the same can be said for the floor. Story is handled in a Dark-Souls inspired style where we tried to let the game tell it all rather than feed you text after text. 

It's short and we hope you enjoy!

The controls are fairly simple

ASWD keys and Mouse to Move

Space bar to Jump

The game was made by 2 guys and a freelance artist for Brackeys Gamejam February 2022 and decided to try their hands at making their very first game in 7 days. The theme has been "It is not real". This is the result.
